last_episode_to_air.name: The Wright Kind of Christmas
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Hugh reminds Spencer that their family tradition, known as Wrightmas, starts today, Spencer is desperate in attempts to hopefully not participate in the event.

name: Dude, That's My Ghost!
overview: Dude, That's My Ghost! is a French/British animated television series produced by French production company Gaumont Animation that airs on Disney XD in the United Kingdom. The series was created and designed by Jan Van Rijsselberge. Dude, That's My Ghost! has been greenlit for 52 x 11 minute episodes. The show premiered on February 2, 2013 on Disney XD.

episodes.name: Scaring Mallory
episodes.overview: When Billy scares Mallory enough to make her consider moving out of town, Spencer must try and convince her to stay.

episodes.name: Billy Joe Cobra Museum
episodes.overview: To raise money, Spencer turns the mansion into the Billy Joe Cobra museum, but runs into problems when Billy Joe becomes annoyed by the guests.

episodes.name: Billy Joe the Scholar
episodes.overview: Spencer runs into trouble when he takes advantage of Billy by tricking him into doing his homework.

episodes.name: Cuckoo's Nest
episodes.overview: Spencer has to make sure everything in his house is normal when he's faced with expulsion for being weird.

episodes.name: School of Rockers
episodes.overview: Spencer runs into trouble during the school's talent contest.

episodes.name: How To Impress Ladies
episodes.overview: Billy helps Spencer find a date to the Shorty Awards.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Spencer Wright
episodes.overview: Billy turns Spencer into a ghost.

episodes.name: Axe Maniac
episodes.overview: Billy feels neglected when Spencer pays more attention to a new video game than to him.

episodes.name: Sports Hero
episodes.overview: Spencer tries to become more popular by being a sports star so people will notice his films.

episodes.name: Biopic Trap
episodes.overview: Spencer has to find a way to save his reputation when he's forced to direct a biography of Principal Ponzi.

episodes.name: Pool Monster
episodes.overview: When Billy's ectoplasm contaminates Spencer's goldfish, it mutates into a piranha that the two must dispose from the family pool.

episodes.name: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: Spencer has to find a way to get rid of Kleet after Jessica develops a crush on him.

episodes.name: Billy Joe's Last Fan
episodes.overview: Hoover pretends to be a fan of Billy in order to capture him.

episodes.name: Let's Do Lunch
episodes.overview: Spencer pretends to be an accomplished director in order to get a big-time movie producer to hire him.

episodes.name: Billy Do Joe
episodes.overview: Spencer's attempt at a kung fu film goes awry when he casts Kleet as the villain

episodes.name: Billy Blob
episodes.overview: Spencer uses a blob of gum mutated by Billy's ectoplasm in his new movie, but has to stop it when it begins expanding and swallowing everything in sight.

episodes.name: True Party
episodes.overview: Spencer throws a birthday party for Rajeev on Billy's private jet.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Popera
episodes.overview: Spencer lies to Billy in order to attend a pop star's concert and hang out with Mallory.

episodes.name: Rock 'n' Home
episodes.overview: Spencer has to prove to his parents that he is responsible enough to stay home alone.

episodes.name: Ghost Mascot
episodes.overview: Spencer tries out for the school's wrestling team in order to avoid being put in Principal Ponzi's aerobics class.

episodes.name: Best Day Ever
episodes.overview: Spencer and Billy team up to make a music video, but their creative differences quickly lead to them turning against each other.

episodes.name: Trouble with Hairy
episodes.overview: Billy's ectoplasm-smeared fur coat turns Spencer into a werewolf, and it's picture day at school.

episodes.name: School Of Terror
episodes.overview: Spencer cooks up a scheme to get Ponzi fired, but the new principal turns out to be even worse.

episodes.name: Where's Wendy
episodes.overview: When Spencer arranges for Billy's former pet miniature crocodile to be brought home from the zoo, the pet turns out not to be miniature at all â€“ and has its sights set on Hugh.

episodes.name: The Candidate
episodes.overview: When Lolo runs for class president, promising to put Spencer and his friends in a loser trailer if she's elected, Spencer has no choice but to run against her.

episodes.name: For The Birds
episodes.overview: When Spencer has to compete against Lolo to sell the most candy for charity, he makes the mistake of accepting Billy's help, with hilarious but disastrous results.

episodes.name: Little Billy
episodes.overview: When Billy unwittingly turns a vintage Billy doll into a voodoo doll, then Ponzi gets a hold of it, bad things start happening to Billy.

episodes.name: Lolo in Love
episodes.overview: Billy helps Rajeev win Lolo's affection by teaching him one of his songs which has amazing love powers. Things go wrong when Lolo accidentally hears Spencer singing it instead.

episodes.name: Billy's Achilles
episodes.overview: When Billy discovers that Madame X is no longer interested in capturing him, as she's moved onto healthier pursuits, he goes on a desperate search for a new obsessed fan.

episodes.name: Reality Showdown
episodes.overview: Spencer convinces his family to be on a reality show, thinking it will be good publicity for his movies, but is unpleasantly surprised to find the show's producer is Lolo.

episodes.name: A Place In The Sun
episodes.overview: When Spencer stands up to Lolo and unwittingly becomes the new "king of the school", he finds that power corrupts.

episodes.name: Copycat Cobra
episodes.overview: Another ghost, who's a huge Billy fan, shows up at the mansion to hang out with his idol, and won't take no for an answer.

episodes.name: Bad Publicity
episodes.overview: Spencer makes a deal with a famous Hollywood publicist in order to gain exposure for his movies, but has to rescue Billy when she ends up capturing him.

episodes.name: Soccer Star
episodes.overview: When Billy hears how popular pro-athletes can be, he possesses Kleet's body to try to get some fame, but his egotistical on-field antics land him in huge trouble.

episodes.name: Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy
episodes.overview: Billy clones himself in order to finish a new song quickly, but when he and his clones spend the whole time goofing off, Spencer has to find a way to get the song finished or risk being labeled a fraud.

episodes.name: And the Winner Is...
episodes.overview: Spencer tries to sneak into the Fame Awards to see his movie idol win after Ponzi sentences him to after-school detention.

episodes.name: House Haunts
episodes.overview: Spencer loses his necklace and can't see Billy anymore, but still has to find a way to stop Hoover when his parents decide to hire a ghost hunter.

episodes.name: House of Horrors
episodes.overview: Spencer turns the mansion into a huge haunted house for a Halloween contest, but when Billy accidentally merges with the house, it becomes a real horror fest.

episodes.name: The Blair Wright Project
episodes.overview: Hugh takes Spencer and Rajeev into the desert for a camping trip, but the boys' plan to shoot a horror movie there goes awry when Billy's ectoplasm turns Hugh into a real monster.

episodes.name: Zombie Love
episodes.overview: Spencer has to save everyone in his school when Billy's ectoplasm-filled cologne turns them into love-happy zombies.

episodes.name: Summertime Rules!
episodes.overview: Spencer has to find a way to keep his summer job as head towel boy at the Beverly Beach Club when Ponzi tricks him into driving away all the guests.

episodes.name: Merman
episodes.overview: Rajeev turns into a merman after Billy adds some ectoplasm to his muscle cream, and a jealous Spencer attempts to steal some of the resulting spotlight for himself.

episodes.name: Escape From Beverly Beverly High
episodes.overview: Spencer gets accepted into the Beverly Film Academy, but enlists Lolo, Kleet, and iStevie's help in retrieving his transcript when Ponzi locks it up in a high-security vault.

episodes.name: The Substitute
episodes.overview: Spencer has to protect Billy at school when Hoover poses as a new substitute teacher, but gets some additional help from Principal Ponzi.

episodes.name: Three's A Crowd
episodes.overview: When Spencer encourages Billy and Rajeev to keep each other company while he's away, the two become best buddies and make Spencer feel like the odd man out.

episodes.name: Cheer Up
episodes.overview: Hugh becomes coach of the Beverly Beverly High cheer squad and when he's injured, passes the job on to a reluctant Spencer.

episodes.name: Ponzi's Got Talent
episodes.overview: Spencer tries to get Ponzi to pursue his lost dream of being a great ribbon dancer, in the hope that he'll quit his job and leave Spencer in peace.

episodes.name: The Sleepover
episodes.overview: Spencer, Rajeev and Shanila wake up in the middle of the night at a school-sponsored sleepover, with no memory of the night's events and Billy missing.

episodes.name: The Hat
episodes.overview: Billy gives Spencer a magical hat that allows him to gain confidence. When everyone overhears about it, they'll stop at no cost to get the hat from whoever possesses it.

episodes.name: Evil Wig
episodes.overview: When some of Billy's ectoplasm gets soaked into Principal Ponzi's wig, It causes it to become evil, and it's up to Billy and Spencer to get rid of it.

episodes.name: The Wright Kind of Christmas
episodes.overview: When Hugh reminds Spencer that their family tradition, known as Wrightmas, starts today, Spencer is desperate in attempts to hopefully not participate in the event.

episodes.name: Evil Billy
episodes.overview: Billy fears that he'll lose his hair. In attempts to prevent it, he uses a hair machine which causes side effects to turn him evil.

episodes.name: Confession
episodes.overview: Spencer needs to come into terms with his crush. He never believed he would like him, but it seems things have ended that way.
